remaining_time.title: Remaining Time
remaining_time.description: Ice Hockey, Basketball, American Football, Handball

remaining_time_in_period.title: Remaining Time In Period
remaining_time_in_period.description: Ice Hockey, Basketball, American Football, Handball

competitor_id.title: Competitor Id
competitor_id.description: The competitor_id of the sport to be deleted

event_id.title: Event Id
event_id.description: The event_id of the sport to be deleted

tournament_id.title: Tournament Id
tournament_id.description: The tournament_id of the sport to be deleted

game_id.title: Game Id
game_id.description: Game unique identifier on wallet's side

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Each item in txs corresponds to action in request (rollback)

sport_id.title: Sport Id
sport_id.description: Id of the sport for which the queue needs to be updated

sport_sort_order.title: Sport Sort Order
sport_sort_order.description: New order for a specific sport

action_id.title: Action Id
action_id.description: action_id of the corresponding action (from request)

tx_id.title: Tx Id
tx_id.description: Unique transaction identifier in wallet. Maybe be empty string if original action was not processed.

bonus_amount.title: Bonus Amount
bonus_amount.description: format: integer, from 0 to 2<<63-1. Bonus amount stores the amount of bonus money a player placed a bet on. Bonus amount is received from the casino. It could be any value from 0 to the bet amount
